channel.title: Quick Question
channel.description:
Ok I have a vid of my 585 server and was wondering if I could post it here.
I dont have any links, sites, or advertising of any kind. Would this be ok?

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

If you’re posting it for reasons that aren’t related to your server then yes. For example of you’re showing off your video editing skills you may post it, but if you’re showing off your server then no.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick Question
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“G-Maker, post:3, topic:353172”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=449475.msg3297648#msg3297648 date=1281050266]
If there are no links and no advertisement whatsoever, you can post it in server development I guess.
[/quote]lol i did, but it never gets any views or comments or anything there. There is alot more activity here, and I like the people in this specific section.[/quote]You cannot post it here, end of discussion.

Read full topic
